content: 1. Added support for tron, solana, and pego networks
content_zh_Hant:
1. 首頁新增節點狀態顯示小圓點，點選可以進入節點選擇介面.
2. 修復首頁代幣顯示錯誤的問題.
3. 最佳化我的資產頁面載入速度.
content_en:
1. A new node status display small dot is added on the homepage. Click to enter the node selection interface.
2. Fix the problem of incorrect token display on the homepage.
3. Optimize the loading speed of the My Assets page.
content_ja: 1.いくつかの既知の問題を修正
content_vi: 1.Khắc phục một số vấn đề đã biết
note: (更新说明)isUniform值为true时，所有语言版本只会显示content里面的内容
